body_html:
Your pip version might be too old. You could try upgrading it with
pip install --upgrade pip

If your distribution doesn't allow this consider using a virtual environment (check this out)
body_text:
Your pip version might be too old. You could try upgrading it with
pip install --upgrade pip
If your distribution doesn't allow this consider using a virtual environment (check this out)
body:
Your pip version might be too old. You could try upgrading it with 
`pip install --upgrade pip`

If your distribution doesn't allow this consider using a virtual environment (check [this](http://docs.python-guide.org/en/latest/dev/virtualenvs/) out)
